{"image": "//ukcdn.ar-cdn.com/recipes/port512/27874446-188a-4ec1-af38-9fcc694fa229.jpg", "ingredients": ["2 (400g) tins chickpeas, drained and rinsed", "180ml water", "2 tablespoons taco seasoning mix", "8 taco shells"], "steps": ["Place chickpeas in a saucepan over medium heat. Add water and taco seasoning. Cook and stir until thoroughly heated, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove from heat. Mash mixture to crush chickpeas.", "Divide chickpea filling evenly among taco shells."], "name": "Vegetarian chickpea tacos", "prep_time": "10 min", "cook_time": "5 min", "rating": 0.0, "recipe_url": "http://allrecipes.co.uk/recipe/44575/vegetarian-chickpea-tacos.aspx"}
